com.prodp.apsim
Class APOBJWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.prodp.apsim.APOBJWriter

public class APOBJWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Writes the coordinate data in the APSim cubes to a .OBJ/.MTL file for external rendering.

Constructor Summary
APOBJWriter(java.io.File f, APProcess process)
          Main constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Flushes and closes the streams (due to the buffered nature of the streams).
 void write()
          Writes coordinate and color info to the file.

Constructor Detail

APOBJWriter

public APOBJWriter(java.io.File f,
                   APProcess process)
Main constructor. Creates a writer based on a file and the process containing the APSim data.

Parameters:
f - the file
process - the APProcess containing the data.
